class.name: ItemList
class.brief_description: Control that provides a list of selectable items (and/or icons) in a single column, or optionally in multiple columns.
class.description: This control provides a selectable list of items that may be in a single (or multiple columns) with option of text, icons, or both text and icon. Tooltips are supported and may be different for every item in the list. Selectable items in the list may be selected or deselected and multiple selection may be enabled. Selection with right mouse button may also be enabled to allow use of popup context menus. Items may also be 'activated' with a double click (or Enter key).

method.name: add_icon_item
method.description: Adds an item to the item list with no text, only an icon.

method.name: add_item
method.description: Adds an item to the item list with specified text. Specify an icon of null for a list item with no icon. If selectable is true the list item will be selectable.

method.name: clear
method.description: Remove all items from the list.

method.name: ensure_current_is_visible
method.description: Ensure selection is visible, adjusting the scroll position as necessary.

method.name: get_item_at_position
method.description: Given a position within the control return the item (if any) at that point.

method.name: get_item_count
method.description: Return count of items currently in the item list.

method.name: get_item_text
method.description: Return the text for specified item index.

method.name: get_item_tooltip
method.description: Return tooltip hint for specified item index.

method.name: get_selected_items
method.description: Returns the list of selected indexes.

method.name: get_v_scroll
method.description: Returns the current vertical scroll bar for the List.

method.name: is_item_disabled
method.description: Returns whether or not the item at the specified index is disabled

method.name: is_item_selectable
method.description: Returns whether or not the item at the specified index is selectable.

method.name: is_item_tooltip_enabled
method.description: Returns whether the tooltip is enabled for specified item index.

method.name: is_selected
method.description: Returns whether or not item at the specified index is currently selected.

method.name: remove_item
method.description: Remove item at specified index from the list.

method.name: select
method.description: Select the item at the specified index. Note: This method does not trigger the item selection signal.

method.name: set_item_disabled
method.description: Disable (or enable) item at specified index. Disabled items are not be selectable and do not fire activation (Enter or double-click) signals.

method.name: set_item_icon
method.description: Set (or replace) icon of the item at the specified index.

method.name: set_item_metadata
method.description: Sets a value (of any type) to be stored with the item at the specified index.

method.name: set_item_selectable
method.description: Allow or disallow selection of the item at the specified index.

method.name: set_item_text
method.description: Sets text of item at specified index.

method.name: set_item_tooltip
method.description: Sets tooltip hint for item at specified index.

method.name: set_item_tooltip_enabled
method.description: Sets whether the tooltip is enabled for specified item index.

method.name: sort_items_by_text
method.description: Sorts items in the list by their text.

method.name: unselect
method.description: Ensure item at specified index is not selected.

signal.name: item_activated
signal.description: Fired when specified list item is activated via double click or Enter.

signal.name: item_rmb_selected
signal.description: Fired when specified list item has been selected via right mouse clicking. The click position is also provided to allow appropriate popup of context menus at the correct location.

signal.name: item_selected
signal.description: Fired when specified item has been selected.

signal.name: multi_selected
signal.description: Fired when a multiple selection is altered on a list allowing multiple selection.
